医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
靶向眼部光谱为视网膜健康带来新的曙光研究证明了靶向眼部荧光光谱分析眼底的有效性，为眼部疾病的诊断和治疗提供了潜在的进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Targeted-eye-spectroscopy-shines-new-light-on-retinal-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Targeted-eye-spectroscopy-shines-new-light-on-retinal-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd6435e9-7635-41b1-9be9-71d77357c483 Mon, 01 Jan 2024 18:14:00 -0500 Targeted ocular spectroscopy shines new light on retinal health
免疫细胞如何塑造我们最早的呼吸研究描述了胚胎和胎儿阶段人类肺部免疫细胞的发育，揭示了它们对上皮细胞命运和肺部发育的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/How-immune-cells-shape-our-earliest-breaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/How-immune-cells-shape-our-earliest-breaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a9171c8-39a4-4a6f-8e17-e8800d4bcb2f Mon, 01 Jan 2024 18:02:00 -0500 How immune cells shape our earliest breaths
研究显示职业倦怠和职业不满促使医生离开他们的诊所研究调查了医生中职业倦怠、职业成就感和离职意愿的普遍情况，揭示了性别、年龄、种族和专业之间的显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Study-reveals-burnout-and-professional-dissatisfaction-driven-practices-to-leave-their-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Study-reveals-burnout-and-professional-dissatisfaction-having-their-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e24b68b9-efc4-49bd-a876-d741d916ddc2 Mon, 01 Jan 2024 17:51:00 -0500 Study reveals burnout and professional dissatisfaction driving physicians to leave their practices
受孕前接触邻苯二甲酸盐与女性生育能力下降和荷尔蒙失衡有关研究调查了孕前接触邻苯二甲酸盐对女性生殖健康的影响，揭示了与生育力降低、荷尔蒙变化以及氧化应激和炎症增加的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Phthalate-exposure-before-conception-linked-to-reduced-fertility-and-hormonal-imbalances-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Phthalate-exposure-before-conception-linked-to-reduced-fertility-and-hormonal-imbalances-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45dbfdea-e70d-4564-adc0-9206b7e52875 Mon, 01 Jan 2024 17:39:00 -0500 Phthalate exposure before conception linked to reduced fertility and hormonal imbalances in women
随着共和党在边境问题上打击拜登，各州扩大了移民的健康覆盖范围越来越多的州正在向移民开放纳税人资助的健康保险计划，包括那些未经授权居住在美国的移民，尽管共和党人因非法越境非法越境事件急剧增加而攻击总统乔·拜登。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/States-expand-health-coverage-for-immigrants-as-GOP-hits-Biden-over-border-crossings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/States-expand-health-coverage-for-immigrants-as-GOP-hits-Biden-over-border-crossings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=393422af-2853-460d-8600-b298ff52317f Fri, 29 Dec 2023 22:31:20 -0500 States expand health coverage for immigrants as GOP hits Biden over border crossings
“NK细胞接合纳米无人机”可以选择性地靶向并杀死癌细胞UNIST 生物科学系 Sebyung Kang 教授和 Sung Ho Park 教授领导的一项开创性研究揭示了癌症治疗方面的显着突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/Revolutionary-nanodrones-enable-targeted-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/Revolutionary-nanodrones-enable-targeted-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d674a11c-f46f-4e65-b052-455c69134382 Fri, 29 Dec 2023 22:29:00 -0500 "NK cell-engaging nanodrones" can selectively target and kill cancer cells
内分泌学会赞扬俄亥俄州州长德温否决反变性医疗法案内分泌学会是世界上历史最悠久、规模最大的致力于研究和治疗激素相关疾病的专业医学学会，它对州长迈克·德温否决俄亥俄州一项禁止对未成年人进行性别肯定护理的法律提案表示赞赏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/Endocrine-Society-applauds-Ohio-Governor-veto-of-state-ban-on-gender-affirming-care-for-minors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/Endocrine-Society-applauds-Ohio-Governor-veto-of-state-ban-on-gender-affirming-care-for-minors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f54c439f-ddc0-462e-9584-13b630da87b4 Fri, 29 Dec 2023 22:28:00 -0500 Endocrine Society applauds Ohio Governor DeWine's veto of anti-transgender healthcare bill

Mettl3 引导 CD8 T 细胞以最大效率消除感染细胞该研究由中国农业大学生物科学学院于书阳博士、遵义医科大学组织损伤修复与再生医学协同创新中心徐靖宇博士和生物学院杜旭光博士领导。中国农业大学科学学院）并阐明了急性感染模型期间 Mettl3 在 CD8 T 细胞反应中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/Mettl3-guides-CD8-T-cells-to-eliminate-infected-cells-with-maximum-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/Mettl3-guides-CD8-T-cells-to-eliminate-infected-cells-with-maximum-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c655d618-90ac-4f40-afd7-69d475619c9e Fri, 29 Dec 2023 22:13:00 -0500 Mettl3 guides CD8 T cells to eliminate infected cells with maximum efficiency
微生物装饰增强药物输送特异性和安全性宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。微生物大多分布在我们的皮肤和肠道表面，在消化、免疫等生理代谢过程中发挥着至关重要的作用，与疾病密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/Microbial-decoration-enhances-drug-delivery-specificity-and-safety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231229/Microbial-decoration-enhances-drug-delivery-specificity-and-safety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba860ba5-147a-4be4-a0c5-900d5294ec96 Fri, 29 Dec 2023 22:09:00 -0500 Microbial decoration enhances drug delivery specificity and safety
